welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Salcedo, Dominican Republic! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all that Salcedo has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Cibao International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This is a smaller terminal at Cibao International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from La Union Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights to and from La Union Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
